item.title: Dr. Azita Hirsa Receives the Rensselaer Alumni Association (RAA) Teaching Award
item.description: The Industrial and Systems Engineering Department proudly celebrates Dr. Azita Hirsa, recipient of the RAA Teaching Award. Dr. Hirsa’s courses in professional development, ethics, and management of engineering and technology inspire students to connect technical excellence with integrity, purpose, and collaboration. “Students learn best when they feel supported, challenged, and seen as collaborators in our learning journey,” said Dr. Hirsa. “This recognition affirms that those efforts matter.”
item.author: Community

item.title: iEAR Presents: Decolonial Practices in Film Workshop with Suneil Sanzgiri | Oct. 29
item.description: Join us Oct 29 starting at 4:30pm at the Sanctuary for Independent Media. The program opens with a workshop session on film practice. Sanzgiri and Suchak/ Youth FX reflect on the practical work of filmmaking and consider its impact on the histories and communities it engages. The workshop is followed by a dinner for participants, and a concluding screening of works from Sanzgiri’s series Golden Jubilee.

item.description: Jim Evans, Director of MultiMedia Services, will present an overview of Rensselaer’s Digital Asset Management (DAM) System on Thursday October 30, from 11am-Noon.
